org.sd.cluster.job
Class ReadingWorkFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.job.AbstractWorkFactory
      org.sd.cluster.job.ReadingWorkFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkFactory
public class ReadingWorkFactory
extends AbstractWorkFactory

A work factory implementation that reads input work units from a file.

Author:
Spence Koehler
